name: Slingshot Cowboy VR
description: Fun colorful game for all ages and any mood. Nice graphics and fun mechanics make up quality VR experience you won't easily forget. Pull the sling or throw stones at will to reach the score and if it's not enough - make it loud with the flare gun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
